column3: I wonder if we should just get rid of the years. They don't do anything useful...?

> Scripted diff?

Bumping the manpage required compiling the binaries, which is not suitable for a scripted diff.

> I wonder if we should just get rid of the years. They don't do anything useful...?

Agree, but that is a legal question that needs some more discussion.
@MarcoFalke how about scripting this one in the future? 06ba77973e7f8938c8461bffeee3718a8f7712f5
